document_data.Powers: This blood-red concoction was a result of mixing together of special [[alchemical]] [[salt]]s with ashes of burned worg fangs. When consumed, the potion gave the drinker ferocity of a worg that boosted the imbiber's vitality and granted them strength and speed enough for another attack after each kill in battle.
